name: Furball Catacombs
description:
Welcome to the Furball Catacombs!

Go on an epic hunting trip to get the most dangerous game: a mouse with a hat.

The Cat Dimension Awaits...

You are a cat; nature's fiercest hunter. Your human though? No idea how to hunt. There's only one thing you can do: venture into the Cat Dimension, defeat the Mouse of Yendor, and bring it back to leave in your human's shoe.

Explore a strange world...

This place is weird and full of dangerous mice, bugs, vacuums, and worse. Space doesn't work properly here; you can wander for hours just to find yourself back where you began. But cats are nothing if not persistent and full of adventure; you've got this!

Features
  • Be a cat.
  • Scratch a large number of scratching posts.
  • Explore a labyrinth that defies all known laws of geometry.
  • Meet robovacuums that autonomously clean up after you (and are VERY SCARY).
  • Find catnip and bombs.
  • Lick yourself until you get a hairball.
  • Touchscreen support. Play on your phone!
How to play
  • Move around with your choice of touchscreen, arrow keys, numpad, or vim-keys.
    • Walk into most things to interact with them!
  • Wait for a turn with the period key, the middle button on the numpad, or by drawing a circle on touchscreen.
  • Click or tap the buttons to perform most actions.
  • Common actions can also be done on the keyboard! Most notably:
    • 'u' or 'e' to use/eat items, either (in order of priority) an item on the ground, or in your mouth.
    • 'g' to get items, 'd' to drop them.
    • '>' to go down stairs.
Credits

Created by Lauren Hetherington for the 7 Day Roguelike challenge (7DRL).

Uses the Roguelike Pumpkin Patch library.

The source code is on GitHub! Check it out, if you're interested!
